entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 19.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 19. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Light snow. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this evening then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 21.
